name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Top Follow Apk- Auto Follower Remover

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: top follow removes  mass followers on Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Topfollow mass followers remover of specific Instagram accounts automatically by simply click on the extension icon in your chrome browser for follow the below steps.

How to use the extension?

1. First of all, You must login to your Instagram account on your chrome browser.

2. Now click on the extension then click "load followers".

3. This will go to your Instagram account and show your account followers list.

4. From the list you can easily remove mass followers easily.

5. The remover count will be shown at the bottom of the screen.

6. Instagram has some limits so use it accordingly. 

* Important Note: The Insta account must be in public so before using this tool change its privacy settings.

Thanks for using our extension.
